name: Brent R. Waters
content: Brent Waters Publications CV DBLP Google Scholar ORCID UT Cryptography Group Brent Waters Professor, University of Texas at Austin Distinguished Scientist, NTT Research Department of Computer Science, The University of Texas at Austin 2317 Speedway, Stop D9500 Austin TX 78712 bwaters@cs.utexas.edu Selected Awards IEEE Fellow (2025) IACR Fellow (2024) ACM Fellow (2021) Simons Investigator (2019) Grace Murray Hopper Award (2015) Presidential Early Career Award for Scientists and Engineers (PECASE) (2011) Packard Fellowship (2011) Microsoft Faculty Fellowship (2011) Sloan Fellowship (2010) Current Ph.D. Students Shafik Nassar George Lu Past Ph.D. Students Rachit Garg, Ph.D. 2024 Satya Vusirikala, Ph.D. 2021, Now at Aptos Labs Rishab Goyal, Ph.D. 2019, Now an assistant professor at UW Madison Venkata Koppula, Ph.D. 2018, Now at IIT Delhi Yannis Rouselakis, Ph.D. 2013, Now at NTT Research Technology Promotion Allison Bishop, Ph.D. 2012, Founder and President of Proof Trading
